unnormalised: I remember when my friend Priya, studying at IIT Delhi, was really struggling. We talked a lot, but she needed more. She found an app, recommended by her counsellor, which helped. It wasn't like in "Dear Zindagi," but it was a start. These apps can be useful, especially if reaching a professional is hard. It helped her schedule time for meditation and breathing exercises, and even track her mood.
